name: uPlane for Windows and uPlane for Mac (m1 chip its supported!)
name_original: uPlane for Windows and uPlane for Mac (m1 chip its supported!)
description:
This is a Flight Simulator Game with 7 Airplanes:

Airbus380, Airbus321, Antonov An2, Antonov An 148, Boeing B737-9 Max, Boeing 777;

Find a Island, and Aircrafts what grounded: Airbus A380, Boeing 767 and Airbus A 330-300;

In this Update:

It includes Seasons  and WeatherTimes what changes Automatically after 100sec.

Rain And Snow effects.

finally it includes Clouds!
